items.sentence: Mary was Tom\'s girlfriend when he was in high school.
You\'re not the only one here who can\'t speak French.
You\'re the only person who can help Tom, aren\'t you?
Is there anything you want to add to what I just said?
Tom never told anyone about what he had done that day.
I decided I didn\'t want anything more to do with Tom.
Do you have any idea when Tom is planning to get here?
Every time Tom visits Boston, he drops by for a visit.
Tom told me that I didn\'t have permission to do that.
Tom lost his cool and started throwing things at Mary.
